timeline.bodyText: does multiply base go before addition? if yes i'd prefer to specify that
timeline.author: liach

replies.bodyText: Multiply base occurs after addition, but uses the base value.
replies.author: i509VCB

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change COMMENT

The total value is the equal to the sum of all additions and base multiplications applied by an attribute modifier. COMMENT

The total value is equal to the sum of all additions and base multiplications applied by an attribute modifier.
timeline.author: YanisBft
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -28,7 +28,18 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_1322 net/minecraft/entity/attribute/EntityAttributeMod METHOD method_6186 getValue ()D METHOD method_6189 getId ()Ljava/util/UUID; CLASS class_1323 Operation + COMMENT Represents an operation which can be applied to an attribute modifier. + FIELD field_6328 ADDITION Lnet/minecraft/class_1322$class_1323; + COMMENT Adds to the base value of an attribute. FIELD field_6329 id I + FIELD field_6330 MULTIPLY_BASE Lnet/minecraft/class_1322$class_1323; + COMMENT Multiplies the base value of the attribute. + COMMENT + COMMENT

Is applied after addition. + FIELD field_6331 MULTIPLY_TOTAL Lnet/minecraft/class_1322$class_1323; + COMMENT Multiplies the total value of the attribute. + COMMENT + COMMENT

The total value is the equal to the sum of all additions and base multiplications applied by an attribute modifier.
